query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS candidateEngagement (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  candidateId INT NOT NULL,
  employerId INT NOT NULL,
  totalEmailsSent INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalEmailsOpened INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalLinksClicked INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalResponses INT DEFAULT 0,
  openRate INT DEFAULT 0,
  clickRate INT DEFAULT 0,
  responseRate INT DEFAULT 0,
  engagementScore INT DEFAULT 0,
  engagementLevel ENUM('very_low', 'low', 'medium', 'high', 'very_high') DEFAULT 'medium',
  lastEngagementAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  firstEngagementAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_candidate_employer (candidateId, employerId),
  INDEX idx_engagement_score (engagementScore DESC),
  INDEX idx_engagement_level (engagementLevel),
  INDEX idx_employer (employerId),
  FOREIGN KEY (candidateId) REFERENCES candidates(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (employerId) REFERENCES employers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
